**Assignments and Deadlines**

1) Install R (https://cran.r-project.org/)
2) Install RStudio (https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/)
3) [Intro R Lab](labs/01_introR.html) due Wednesday 9/11 at 10pm. I only want to see the 3 questions from the lab in your submission file, not the entire text of the tutorial lab.

**Note:** Homework/Labs should be neatly formatted with questions specified as headers and with your R code and written solutions underneath. [Here is an example](homework/example_hw1.pdf) of how it should look (courtesy of Professor Nolte)
